"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is a work accident?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A WORK ACCIDENT is a violent injury of the body, as well as the acute professional intoxication, which takes place during the process of work or in fulfilling the duties of service and which causes temporary work incapacity of at least 3 calendar days, disability or death.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":151881,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51e1ddfb-53fd-40c6-b2a5-e2ba275fe93c/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51e1ddfb-53fd-40c6-b2a5-e2ba275fe93c/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"3.PNG\",\"name\":\"3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"51e1ddfb-53fd-40c6-b2a5-e2ba275fe93c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":719,\"height\":644},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{\"size\":39559,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/816caf12-42c7-4b26-889f-b68d40c141f8/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/816caf12-42c7-4b26-889f-b68d40c141f8/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"3.PNG\",\"name\":\"3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"816caf12-42c7-4b26-889f-b68d40c141f8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":748,\"height\":247},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Accidents\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The accident suffered by employees on the way from home to work or vice versa is considered a work-related accident if the following conditions are
